# polytomic_azureblob_connection (Data Source)

Azure Blob Storage Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_azureblob_connection" "azureblob" {
  organization = polytomic_organization.acme.id
  id           = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
